SafetyInspectionBy: NORTH DAKOTA INSURANCE DEPT. BOILER INSPECTOR

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

THE ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE POLICIES AT OUR FACILITY.

THIS FACILITY COMPLIES WITH THE OSHA REG 29 CFR 1910.11 AND IT IS OUR POLICY TO COMPLY TO ALL APPLICABLE FEDERAL, STATE, AND LOCAL LAWS. IF AN EMERGENCY WERE TO OCCUR OUR POLICY IS TO NOTIFY THE WATFORD CITY RURAL FIRE DEPT. AND MCKENZIE COUNTY LEPC AND ASK FOR THEIR ASSISTANCE.

DESCRIPTION OF FACILITY AND REGULATED SUBSTANCE HANDLED.

OUR FACILITY IS ANHYDROUS AMMONIA STORAGE FACILITY, THA ANHYDROUS AMMONIA IS USED IN THE AGRICULTURE INDUSTRY. WE BRING THE PRODUCT IN BY TRANSPORT AND UNLOAD INTO THE STORAGE TANK, WHICH IS A 30,000 GALLON TANK.  FROM THE STORAGE TANK WE FILL THE NURSE TANKS, WHICH THE CUSTOMER WILL COME INTO THE PLANT AND PICKUP AS THE NEED THEM.

GENERAL ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION PROGRAM AND CHEMICAL-SPECIFIC PREVENTION STEPS.

THIS FACILITY COMPLIES WITH EPA'S ACCIDENT PREVENTION RULE AND APPLICABLE STATE AND LOCAL CODES AND REGULATIONS, THIS ANHYDROUS AMMONIA SYSTEM IS DESIGNED, INSTALLED AND MAINTAINED IN ACCORDANCE WITH ALL STATE,FEDERAL AND LOCAL LAWS.

FIVE YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY

WE HAVE NEVER HAD AN ACCIDENT INVOLVING ANHYDROUS AMMONIA THAT CAUSED DEATHS, INJURIES, PROPERTY OR ENVIRONMENTAL DAMAGE OR EVACUATIONS.

EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM

IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY INVOLVING OUR ANHYDROUS AMMONIA SYSTEM, IT IS OUR POLICY TO NOTIFY THE LOCAL FIRE DEPT. AND THE LOCAL EMERGENCY PLANNING COORDINATOR AND HAVE THEM RESPOND TO THE EMERGENCY. OUR SYSTEM HAS BEEN INSPECTED THE NORTH DAKOTA STATE DEPT. OF INSURANCE BOILER INSPECTOR.

PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY IS TO CONTINUE TO INSPECT, UPDATE AND MAINTAIN THE EQUIPMENT, AND CONTINUE TO PROVIDE TRAINING FOR EMPLOYEE'S IN THE HANDLING OF THE PRODUCT AND OPERATION OF THE PLANT.
